description:
The Akudarma trio travel to 17th century Edo in order to find Kasuga no Tsubone, who established the Ooku. They see that the rattle she’s using to calm Takechiyo (who would later become Tokugawa Iemitsu) has the Dynamond on it. They Time Bokan to a period where Takechiyo is older, and Kasuga no Tsubone tells them that she’ll give the rattle to the woman who becomes Iemitsu’s wife. And then Tokio and Calen show up and they battle to see who can become Iemitsu’s bride.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kasuga no Tsubone Was the Daughter of a Traitor! What Was the Super Surprising Reason She Climbed to the Top of the Ooku?!
Kasuga no Tsubone wa Uragirimono no Musume Datta! Oooku no Chouten ni Noboritsumeta Bikkuri Dokkuri na Riyuu no wa!?
春日局は裏切り者の娘だった! 大奥の頂点にのぼりつめたビックリドッキリな理由とは!?
